name: VRx
description:
Ever wanted to swing around a city like spiderman? Need to pick up a prescription? Well this game does both! Swing around the city to collect your Rx prescriptions before time runs out! There's a catch, the floor is lava!

Used SteamVR Version 2.2.0. Tried on Oculus. Should be compatible with Vive but have not tested. If you test it and it works please let me know~! 

Movement: Trigger Keys on Controllers

Goal: Collect Rx Medicine before time runs out

Restart: Press Trigger Button Once Dead
